I'm from America and honestly outraged action hasn't been taken to defend Israel. 

And it may not be “fair” to you, but instead of complaining about what's fair we need to stand up and pray for the countries and people being attacked.

My or should I say the president of the United States should have already put our military to war with ISIS. We should have already defeated them. 

But that's just my opinion. Whatever
